feed.title: The Reading Dimension
feed.subtitle: Welcome to my own little corner of the web! Here, I muse about a variety of topics, mostly tech-related, but I also dabble in others like anime, manga, writing, and gaming as well! (•‿•)

entry.title: Finally Moved Over To Jekyll Chirpy!

link.title: Finally Moved Over To Jekyll Chirpy!

entry.summary: After much deliberation on my part and messing around with different themes, I finally decided to go with the Jekyll Chirpy theme!

entry.title: Writing Challenge: Final Review and Results

link.title: Writing Challenge: Final Review and Results

entry.summary: Whelp, a week has passed but unfortunately due to unforeseen events with the weather, writing was far from being the most important thing in my mind these last couple of days...

entry.title: Challenging Myself to Write More, Hopefully!

link.title: Challenging Myself to Write More, Hopefully!

entry.summary: I've been having trouble writing fiction as of late. I have this original work that I have been mulling over for a while now and really like to get the first chapter out this year, but all I managed to write was some of the worldbuilding, CVs, and some notes.

entry.title: Spice and Wolf: Merchant Meets the Wise Wolf is Fantastic so Far!

link.title: Spice and Wolf: Merchant Meets the Wise Wolf is Fantastic so Far!

entry.summary: I'm not much of a seasonal anime watcher, but this last season is an exception! With the return of the fantastic Spice and Wolf! And now that the first half has finished airing, I'd like to share my thoughts on it!

entry.title: Transferring Files: The Better Way!
entry.summary: Recently, I've been dealing with transferring large files, and while there are plenty of tools available to do the job, most of them are slow, have a size limit, or are cumbersome to set up. Luckily, I learned about a powerful and simple-to-use tool called croc while looking for alternatives, and it's exactly what I've been looking for in a file transfer tool!
